segments.text: This scene is frankly making me quite irritated.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: How can an adult be so completely out of touch with her surroundings?
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The sink is literally gushing water onto the floor!
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Her foot is soaked, and she still hasn't even glanced down.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: That level of obliviousness is just irresponsible when children are nearby.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: And those poor kids are going to get hurt on that wobbly stool.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: She should be paying attention, not just polishing a plate as the house floods.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It's an accident waiting to happen, and it's entirely preventable.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The potential for someone to slip and break something is enormous.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I'm just fuming watching this unfold without any intervention.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Someone needs to step in and fix this before it escalates.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It's a ridiculous situation caused by simple inattention.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The damage to the floor and cabinets will be significant if this continues.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: This negligence is simply unacceptable in a home environment.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I truly hope she snaps out of it very soon.
segments.speaker: PAR
